data.title: Kwame Brown Accused of Sexual Assualt
data.meta_description: Must be something in the water down there.  And could this come at a worse time for the Lakers?  Thinking it might all be part of Stern's master plan...
data.text:
Bricklayer

Don't Make Me Use The Bat

May 2, 2006

Must be something in the water down there. And could this come at a worse time for the Lakers? Thinking it might all be part of Stern's master plan.

http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/12601063/

LAPD: Lakers' Kwame Brown Accused Of Sexual Assault

KNBC-TV

4:20 p.m. PDT May 2, 2006

LOS ANGELES - The Lakers' Kwame Brown is being investigated for an alleged sexual assault at an area hotel, according to the Los Angeles Police Department. The alleged assault occurred Sunday after the team's playoff victory against the Phoenix Suns, police said.

The Suns and Lakers are scheduled to play Tuesday night.

VF21

Super Moderator Emeritus

May 2, 2006

Well, you can tell Brown must be getting better.

Women never file charges against the benchwarmers...

May 2, 2006

Yo Brick you wouldn't understand... It's a Laker thing.

May 2, 2006

Who would have thought that it could happen to a Laker ?

May 2, 2006

So should we call the Lakers bench the SVU?

May 2, 2006

It's an LA thing in many ways. Every time I hear a story like this, I remember a girl in my high school whose ex-boyfriend made it into the NBA. You could see her eyeballs light up with dollar signs as she proudly boasted of a plan to make a similar claim as a way of getting back at him for cheating.

Considering the player's current level of "success," its probably best that she apparently decided against it. Her full settlement would have probably equalled the number of pennies I found on the ground today.

F

Fillmoe

Guest

May 2, 2006

kobe is rubbing off...

May 2, 2006

It will probably have the same outcome as the other lFaker. I would say how stupid would you have to be to do this at all but especially during the PO's, but then it is Kwame so never mind.

May 2, 2006

Wow. Too many similarities. Sad if true. So sad.

May 2, 2006

Will Reggie Evans be charged with sexual assault?

May 2, 2006

GoGoGadget said:

It's an LA thing in many ways. Every time I hear a story like this, I remember a girl in my high school whose ex-boyfriend made it into the NBA. You could see her eyeballs light up with dollar signs as she proudly boasted of a plan to make a similar claim as a way of getting back at him for cheating.

Considering the player's current level of "success," its probably best that she apparently decided against it. Her full settlement would have probably equalled the number of pennies I found on the ground today.

What player?

May 2, 2006

CreeksideBaller said:

What player?

Don't think it's important to the story, and it was a friend of mine, so I'm not going to go there.

A

AriesMar27

Guest

May 2, 2006

we still want to know which player... is he still playing?
